name: TI-84 Plus C Image Var Format

description: The 8CA Image Var file is created when converting JPEG, PNG, BMP, TIF or GIF images using TI Connect software. The image is resized to 83 x 133 pixels when it is converted to an Image Var file and is stored in Archive memory. Each calculator model has its own default images and only ten images can be stored on the TI-84 Plus CE calculator.
